articles.title: Under new guidelines, more Americans meet the criteria for high blood pressure - PBS
articles.description: The new guidelines released by the American Heart Association and the American College of Cardiology lower the threshold for hypertension treatment and offer a more personalized approach.
articles.content:
Nearly half of all Americans have high blood pressure a condition called hypertension.
Hypertension is the No. 1 risk factor for heart disease and stroke. In addition, hypertension increases risk of… [+7858 chars]
